title: OT57: Chopin Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- The post is an open thread with various topics and questions
- Scott shares useful information he learned from the comments of his previous post about pharmacological tolerance
- Scott warns others not to use Bank of America ATMs as they can randomly take cards and not give them back

Key learnings:
- Be wary of using Bank of America ATMs
- Comments on previous posts can be helpful and informative

Key questions:
- None mentioned in this portion of the post.
